Action.author: stevetolman
Action.body: ~farooq_m_khan This is working correctly so you can connect to the correct sandbox pool. If you are wanting to be able to switch between multiple sandboxes we would need to add that functionality to the CLI. Please let us know what you are wanting from this ticket.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: Don't delete the existing file just rename it and then create the new file.

Action.author: ozheregelya
Action.body: Ticket is not actual anymore because of changing current python CLI to indy-sdk based CLI.
